    @allure.story("Add Product to Shopping Cart")
    def test_add_product_to_cart(self):
        with allure.step("Send POST request to add a product to the shopping cart"):
            data = {"product_id": "123", "quantity": -2}
            response = requests.post('http://localhost:5000/add_to_cart', json=data)
    
        allure.attach("Request URL", 'http://localhost:5000/add_to_cart')
        allure.attach("Request Method", 'POST')
        allure.attach("Request Data", str(data))
        allure.attach("Response Status Code", str(response.status_code))
    
        with allure.step("Check if the response status code is not 200, as it should fail"):
